SELECT SI_BOARDING_SCHEDULE.SI_BOARDING_SCHEDULE_ID ,
SI_BOARDING_SCHEDULE.MS_SENIN_ID , SI_BOARDING_SCHEDULE.MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , SI_BOARDING_SCHEDULE.MS_VESSEL_ID , SI_BOARDING_SCHEDULE.SIGN_ON_DATE , SI_BOARDING_SCHEDULE.SIGN_OFF_SI_CARD_ID , SI_BOARDING_SCHEDULE.STATUS ,
SENIN.SEI || ' ' || SENIN.MEI as SIGN_ON_CREW_NAME,
SI_BOARDING_SCHEDULE.DELETE_FLAG , SI_BOARDING_SCHEDULE.SEND_FLAG , SI_BOARDING_SCHEDULE.VESSEL_ID , SI_BOARDING_SCHEDULE.DATA_NO , SI_BOARDING_SCHEDULE.USER_KEY , SI_BOARDING_SCHEDULE.RENEW_DATE , SI_BOARDING_SCHEDULE.RENEW_USER_ID , SI_BOARDING_SCHEDULE.TS
FROM SI_BOARDING_SCHEDULE
INNER JOIN MS_SENIN SENIN ON SENIN.MS_SENIN_ID = SI_BOARDING_SCHEDULE.MS_SENIN_ID
WHERE SI_BOARDING_SCHEDULE.DELETE_FLAG = 0

INSERT INTO SI_BOARDING_SCHEDULE( SI_BOARDING_SCHEDULE_ID ,
MS_SENIN_ID , MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , MS_VESSEL_ID , SIGN_ON_DATE , SIGN_OFF_SI_CARD_ID , STATUS ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :SI_BOARDING_SCHEDULE_ID ,
:MS_SENIN_ID , :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , :MS_VESSEL_ID , :SIGN_ON_DATE , :SIGN_OFF_SI_CARD_ID , :STATUS ,
:DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE SI_BOARDING_SCHEDULE SET MS_SENIN_ID = :MS_SENIN_ID , MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID = :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , MS_VESSEL_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ID , SIGN_ON_DATE = :SIGN_ON_DATE , SIGN_OFF_SI_CARD_ID = :SIGN_OFF_SI_CARD_ID , STATUS = :STATUS ,
DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE SI_BOARDING_SCHEDULE_ID = :SI_BOARDING_SCHEDULE_ID AND TS = :TS
